not at all, 1559 does not set a maximum gas limit

proposers could coordinate to raise the gas limit to say 100M or even more gas theoretically

author: ralexstokes
content: all 1559 does is apply congestion pricing as a function of block size with some "slack" space allocated to handle temporary fluctuations away from some long-run target

author: ralexstokes
content: the target can float up or down just like pre-1559 the gas limit could float up or down
